DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test may help doctor detect cancer cell early plan effective treatment cancer . It yet know type mammography effective detecting breast cancer . PURPOSE : Screening diagnostic trial compare effectiveness two type mammography detect breast cancer woman .
DOC.brief_title: Screening Diagnostic Trial Compare Effectiveness Two Types Mammography Detecting Breast Cancer Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare diagnostic performance digital mammography v screen-film mammography , measure area Receiver Operating Characteristic ( ROC ) curve , sensitivity , specificity , positive negative predictive value , detection breast cancer woman . - Compare diagnostic accuracy digital mammogram obtain use individual manufacturer 's digital unit vs screen-film mammography retrospective reader study . - Determine effect patient characteristic , include age , lesion type , pathologic diagnosis , menopausal hormonal status , breast density , family history , diagnostic accuracy digital mammography . - Determine effect technical parameter , include display type , machine type , detector spatial contrast resolution , diagnostic accuracy digital mammography . - Determine effect reduce false-positive mammogram expect digital mammography health-related quality life personal anxiety woman undergo screen experience . - Compare diagnostic performance digital mammography rate cancer set case retrospective reader study . - Compare effect softcopy v print film display diagnostic performance digital mammography retrospective reader study . - Compare effect breast density diagnostic accuracy digital mammography v screen-film mammography retrospective reader study . - Compare image quality breast radiation dose digital v screen-film mammography participant . - Determine temporal variation image quality , breast radiation dose , quality control parameter participate study center . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Participants postitive screen result stratify accord age ( 50 vs 50-59 vs 60-70 v 70 ) . Participants randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Participants undergo two-view screen-film mammogram follow two-view digital mammogram breast . - Arm II : Participants undergo two-view digital mammogram follow two-view screen-film mammogram breast . Quality life assess screen mammogram first 800 woman enrol . In additional 1,200 participant ( 600 positive screening result 600 negative screen result ) , quality life assess shortly screen mammogram 1 year . Participants follow 1 year repeat screen-film digital mammogram . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 49,500 participant ( 24,750 per arm ) accrue study within 18 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Asymptomatic woman present screen mammography No focal dominant lump bloody clear nipple discharge No prior breast cancer treat lumpectomy Prior mastectomy breast cancer allow No breast implant Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : Any age Sex : Female Menopausal status : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Not specify Renal : Not specify Other : Not pregnant PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : Not specify Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : Not specify Surgery : See Disease Characteristics
